channel.title: How do you let someone host and edit coding
channel.description: How do you let someone host and edit coding from another computer while you also do it on yours?

item.title: How do you let someone host and edit coding
item.dc:creator: @Play_For_Keeps Play For Keeps
item.description:
@Play_For_Keeps wrote:

Letting other peohost your server is almost the worst possible thing you can do. how do you think we have about half the sources we use? most of them are from coders who didn’t want to release em in the first place, but they used a hoster, and the hoster released it.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you let someone host and edit coding

item.title: How do you let someone host and edit coding
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

[quote=“delta, post:2, topic:169202”]1.You give them the server
2. They steal it
3. They release it

That is how you let someone host your server[/quote]

LOLOLOLOL I LOL’D SO HARD, no.

There are complex ways I guess, but the easiest would be storing parts of code on a website (Just use a free host) in seperate threads so that you can both add them and personalize them, talk about them, etc.

Read full topic
